title: Barbican Estate
description: A landmark of post-war urbanism featuring high-density mixed-use housing, the Barbican Centre, and iconic towers.

body.raw:
## Architectural notes

The Barbican synthesises residential slabs, towers, and a cultural centre around elevated pedestrian podiums, separating people from cars. Its rough bush-hammered concrete and repetitive geometries define its character.
